meanings.definition: One who assigns tasks or duties.
meanings.sent1: The tasker gave us each a specific job to do.
meanings.sent2: The teacher is the tasker in our classroom, giving us homework every day.
meanings.sent3: The tasker made sure everyone had a role to play in the school play.
meanings.sent4: As the tasker of the group project, she ensured everyone knew their responsibilities.
meanings.sent5: The tasker's role is crucial in making sure everything gets done on time.

meanings.definition: A person or system that manages tasks or assignments.
meanings.sent1: The tasker at the office keeps track of everyone's progress on the project.
meanings.sent2: Our tasker for the event made sure everything ran smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The tasker in the video game assigns quests to the players.
meanings.sent4: The tasker robot efficiently organizes the warehouse inventory.
meanings.sent5: The tasker app on my phone helps me stay organized with my daily to-dos.

meanings.definition: A software application or tool used for managing tasks.
meanings.sent1: I use a tasker on my computer to keep track of my assignments.
meanings.sent2: The tasker on my phone reminds me of important deadlines.
meanings.sent3: The tasker program helps me prioritize my tasks based on urgency.
meanings.sent4: The tasker software allows me to create to-do lists easily.
meanings.sent5: The tasker tool is essential for staying organized in a busy work environment.
